templates.outSentence: A {{total}}-cell count reveals {{blast}}% blasts, {{pro}}% promyelocytes/myelocytes, {{gran}}% maturing granulocyte forms, {{eryth}}% erythroid forms, {{lymph}}% lymphocytes, {{plasma}}% plasma cells, {{baso}}% basophils/mast cells, and {{mono}}% monocytes.

A {{total}}-cell differential count reveals {{gran}}% myeloid precursors, {{eryth}}% erythroid precursors, {{lymph}}% lymphocytes, {{mono}}% monocytes, {{eos}}% eosinophils, {{baso}}% basophils, {{pro}}% promyelocytes, {{blast}}% blasts, and {{plasma}}% plasma cells.

A {{total}}-cell differential count of peripheral blood reveals: {{poly}}% mature neutrophils, {{band}}% band forms, {{lymph}}% lymphocytes, {{mono}}% monocytes, {{eos}}% eosinophils, {{baso}}% basophils, {{pro}}% immature granulocytic precursors, {{blast}}% blasts, and {{other}}% others.
